column4: hello, I have installed ubuntu for the first time, my primary need is powerpoint but openoffice 3.0.1 is way too slow. How could I downgrade it to 2.x?
go to system>preferences>synaptics ; search for openoffice and see if you could find any older version of it, if found, unmark your 3.0.1 and check the other one

unfortunately, there's no other version. All I found was jaunty and nothing else. So, this means I have to get my hands dirty with apt. Could you give me any guidance to downgrade openoffice? (maybe I should try with an older release of ubuntu or maybe just another distro).
